title: The ETH Merge: BULL OR BEAR? David debates Jordi Alexander
description:
Jordi Alexander returns to debate David Hoffman on whether or not next week's Ethereum Merge is bullish or bearish for ETH. The debate is moderated by none other than, Ryan Sean Adams.

Let us know if you're bullish or bearish in the comments or on Twitter: @banklesshq
